title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Fry the pancetta until crispy.
Beat the eggs with the cheeses.
Drain the pasta and mix with pancetta, eggs, and cheese.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and spices.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Saute the onion and add tomato puree.
Stir in the cream and add the chicken.
Serve with fresh cilantro on top.

title: Sushi
summary: Traditional Japanese dish featuring vinegared rice and raw or cooked seafood.
instructions: Cook sushi rice and mix with vinegar and sugar.
Slice salmon into thin pieces.
Place rice on a nori sheet and add salmon.
Roll the sushi and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian-inspired dish of sautéed beef served in a sauce with sour cream.
instructions: Saute beef until browned, then set aside.
Cook onions and mushrooms in the same pan.
Add flour and broth to the pan and cook until thickened.
Stir in sour cream and add the beef back in.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A popular Thai dish with stir-fried rice noodles, eggs, vegetables, and tofu or meat.
instructions: Soak noodles in warm water until soft.
Stir-fry tofu and shrimp until cooked.
Scramble the eggs in the same pan.
Add noodles, bean sprouts, and sauce, and stir-fry together.
Top with peanuts and serve with lime wedges.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple pizza topped with tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Roll out the pizza dough on a baking sheet.
Top with sliced tomatoes and mozzarella.
Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C for 10-12 minutes.
Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil before serving.

title: Falafel
summary: A Middle Eastern dish made of ground chickpeas or fava beans, deep-fried into balls.
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight and drain.
Blend chickpeas with onion, garlic, and spices.
Shape the mixture into small balls.
Deep-fry until golden brown.
Serve with pita bread and tahini sauce.
